:delay.description: Delay the time it takes to display the loading effect (to prevent flickering)
:delay.description_zh: 延迟显示加载效果的时间（防止闪烁）

fullscreen.description_zh: 显示带有 Spin 组件的背景

:percent.description: Display progress, when setting percent='auto', it will estimate a progress that never stops
:percent.description_zh: 展示进度，当设置 percent="auto" 时会预估一个永远不会停止的进度

size.description: Component size, options: small, default, large
size.description_zh: 组件大小，可选值为 small default large

spinning.description: Whether it is in the Loading state

:tip.description: When used as a wrapper element, the description copy can be customized
:tip.description_zh: 当作为包裹元素时，可以自定义描述文案

wrapperClassName.description: The class attribute of the wrapper

rootClassName.description: className added to the outermost layer of the component
rootClassName.description_zh: 添加在组件最外层的 className

SpinPercent.name: auto
SpinPercent.description: Automatically estimate progress that never stops
SpinPercent.description_zh: 自动预估永远不会停止的进度
